question: You are planning to go and study English at a school overseas. You would like some information about their courses.Write a letter to the school. In your letterask about the schoolsay what kind of accommodation you wantmention any special requests you have (for example diet).
text: I am writing to you to express my sincere thanks for confirming my one-year English admission course with your school. Hence, I would like to know more about the school schedule for the upcoming academic year along with fees related information as well.

Firstly, I am coming from a lower-income family category and it would be good  if there is an opportunity to have shared accommodation which is going to save my daily expenses . If possible I am willing to share my books and basic utilities as well such as Internet, gas and hydro too. Secondly, I am new to  overseas education and request you to please let me know if we have someone to guide me during my first week of stay.

As you know I would prefer only vegetarian food and I am very much appreciated to have only green leaf curry, no matter if there are any additional costs for my special food and I am ready to pay weekly basis. Therefore request you to please do let me know about the vegan diet schedule and payment-related information as well.
